sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-button v-b-toggle.collapse-2 variant="success m-2">建立得獎資料</b-button>
    <b-collapse id="collapse-2" class="m-2">
        <b-card>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">得獎名稱</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="creating.data.title" placeholder="請填入得獎名稱"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">得獎說明</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-textarea
                            id="textarea"
                            v-model="creating.data.context"
                            placeholder="請填入得獎說明"
                            rows="5"
                            max-rows="5"
                            >
                        </b-form-textarea>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>

                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">排名</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="4">
                        <b-form-input v-model="creating.data.title" placeholder="請填入得獎名稱"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">排名樣式</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="4">
                        <b-form-input v-model="creating.data.title" placeholder="請填入得獎名稱"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row>
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">得獎名稱</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="creating.data.title" placeholder="請填入得獎名稱"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>

                <b-col md="12 text-center">
                    <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="createData">創建</b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-card>
    </b-collapse>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
    name: 'App',
    data(){
        return {
            creating: {
                data: [],
                file: []
            },
        }
    },
    created(){
    },
    methods: 
    {
        createData(){
            // Banner資料建立
            axios({
                method: 'post',
                url: 'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/banner/create',
                data: {
                    "title": this.creating.data.title,
                    "context": this.creating.data.context,
                    "file_id": 0
                },
                dataType: 'json',
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json",
                    "Accept": "application/json",
                    "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'),
                }
            })
            .then(response => {
                console.log(response);
            })
            .catch( (error) => {
                console.log(error);
            })
            // 上傳圖片
            axios({
                method: 'post',
                url: 'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/file/create',
                data: {

                },
                dataType: 'json',
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json",
                    "Accept": "application/json",
                    "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'),
                }
            })
            .then(response => {
                console.log(response);
            })
            .catch( (error) => {
                console.log(error);
            })
            // 更新Banner資料庫的檔案id值
            axios({
                method: 'post',
                url: 'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/file/create',
                data: {

                },
                dataType: 'json',
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json",
                    "Accept": "application/json",
                    "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'),
                }
            })
            .then(response => {
                console.log(response);
            })
            .catch( (error) => {
                console.log(error);
            })
        }
    }
}
</script>
